title: Struggling Roma edge Torino as Lazio put five past Como
description: Roma’s embattled manager Ivan Juric found a small reprieve as his side scraped past Torino 1-0 for their first win in four Serie A matches. Paulo Dybala scored the winning goal in the 20th minute, pouncing on a poor backpass from Karol Linetty and rounding Torino goalkeeper Vanja Milinkovic-Savic before applying the finish. The result […] The post Struggling Roma edge Torino as Lazio put five past Como appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews

title: LaLiga clubs pledge to help raise money for victims of Spain´s flash floods
description: LaLiga and its clubs will help raise funds for the Red Cross to support those affected by the flash floods which have killed at least 158 people in Spain. The league aim to raise the money by publicising a campaign during match broadcasts this weekend and through their social media accounts.
